st: Amthu Amthu Ekbijane Malvu Etle Prem
s:
Amthu Amthu Ekbijane Malvu Etle Prem
Aaras Jeva Aaras Nu Ogalvu Etle Prem

st: Shradhdhaj Maari Lai Gai Manzil Uper Mane
s:
Shradhdhaj Maari Lai Gai Manzil Uper Mane
Rasto Bhuli Gayo To Dishao Fari Gai

st: Aapi Aapi Ne Tame Peenchhu Aapo,
s:
Aapi Aapi Ne Tame Peenchhu Aapo,
Sajan Paankho Aapo To Ame Aavie
Aapi Aapi Ne Tame Shamna Aapo,
Sajan Aankho Aapo To Ame Aavie.

st: Kalam Hath Ma Lidhi Tya Ek Aansu Aavyu Aagal…
s:
Kalam Hath Ma Lidhi Tya Ek Aansu Aavyu Aagal…
Zalzaliya Ni Zaankhap Vachche Lakhie Kya Thi Kaagal

st: Pushp Ma Dankho Kadi…Kyarek Kaanta Ma Suvaas,
s:
Pushp Ma Dankho Kadi…Kyarek Kaanta Ma Suvaas,
Laagni Ni Aa Ramat…Aadam Thi Shekhadam Sudhi.

st: Nayan Ma Vasya Che Jara Yaad Karjo,
s:
Nayan Ma Vasya Che Jara Yaad Karjo,
Kadi Kaam Pade To Yaad Karjo,
Mane To Padi Che Aadat Tamne Yaad Karwani,
Jo Hichki Ave To Maf Karjo………

st: Koike Puchyu Aa Dil Ne Kee Te Prit Kari Kone
s:
Koike Puchyu Aa Dil Ne Kee Te Prit Kari Kone
Janva Chata Pan Naam Emnu Ame Lai Na Sakya

st: Baat Rakhi Dil Ma Baat Kahi Na Sakyaa
s:
Baat Rakhi Dil Ma Baat Kahi Na Sakyaa
Yaad Karya Emne Ne Shwash Lai Na Sakyaa

st: Prem Ma Mithi Vedna Mali Ae Bahu Che
s:
Prem Ma Mithi Vedna Mali Ae Bahu Che
Swapno Ne Navi Disha Mali Ae Bahu Che
Prem Puro Thayo Ke Adhuro Rayho Vat Ae Nathi
Prem Karvano Avsar Malyo Ae Bahu Che..

st: Maara Mitro Maari Haalat Joi Taras Naa Khaata
s:
Maara Mitro Maari Haalat Joi Taras Naa Khaata
Prem Ma Judaai Pan,Ek Milan Hoy Chhe
Dharam Dharam Kahi,Tame Maaru Apamaan Naa Karasho
Prem Ma Paagal Kehavaadava Ma Pan Ek Alag Mazaa Chhe…

st: Prem Aapvo Ae Faraj Che..
s:
Prem Aapvo Ae Faraj Che..
Prem Pamvo Ae Kala Che..
Tame Jene Prem Karo Cho Teni Saathe Hovu Ae Naseeb Che..
Pan Tamne Je Prem Kare Che Teni Saathe Hovu Ae Zindagi Che.

st: Dariyo Jem Suno Che Moja Vagar
s:
Dariyo Jem Suno Che Moja Vagar
Prem Ma Maja Na Aave Saza Vagar
Dawa Ni Koi Kimmat Nathi Ilaz Vagar
Etle J Toh Aaj Sudhi Koi Jivyu Nathi Ek-Bija Vagar..

st: Ame Jindgi Ne Savari Ne Betha
s:
Ame Jindgi Ne Savari Ne Betha
Tame Aavsho Aevu Dhari Ne Betha
Fakt Tamara Ek Dil Ne Jitva Ame
Aakho Sansar Hari Ne Betha..

st: Door Rahishu To Pan Dil Ma Rahishu..
s:
Door Rahishu To Pan Dil Ma Rahishu..
Samay Na Sathvare Fari Malta Rahisu..
Aam To Hu Chandra Nathi, Chatay Karso Yaad..
To Amas Ma Pan Malta Rahisu..

st: Tara Mukhda Thee Maari Raat Ujyaari Thay Chhe
s:
Tara Mukhda Thee Maari Raat Ujyaari Thay Chhe
Chaand Pan Tare Saame Joyee Ne Sharmaaye Chhe
Tu Jyare Malkhaye Chhe Tou Mari Jaan Jaaye Chhe
Tu Nathi Janti Baku,Tu Mane Ketli Tadfaaye Chhe

st: Zindagi Malvi Ae Naseeb Ni Vaat Che
s:
Zindagi Malvi Ae Naseeb Ni Vaat Che
Maut Malvu Ae Samay Ni Vaat Che
Pan Maut Pachi Pan Koi Na Dil Ma Jivta Rehvu
Ae Zindagi Ma Karela Karm Ni Vaat Che..

st: Manvi Na Mansuba No Taag Kadi Jadto Nathi..
s:
Manvi Na Mansuba No Taag Kadi Jadto Nathi..
Kevi Karamat Kudrat Ni..
Ek Sarkha Manvi Kadi Ghadto Nathi..
Tara Vina Nahi Jivi Saku.. Aevu Kehnar..
Kadi Saathe Marto Nathi..

st: Kalam Hath Ma Lidhi Tya Ek Aansu Aavyu Aagal…
s:
Kalam Hath Ma Lidhi Tya Ek Aansu Aavyu Aagal…
Zalzaliya Ni Zaankhap Vachche Lakhie Kya Thi Kaagal

st: Baat Rakhi Dil Ma, Baat Kahi Na Sakyaa
s:
Baat Rakhi Dil Ma, Baat Kahi Na Sakyaa
Yaad Karya Emne Ne Shwash Lai Na Sakyaa
Koike Puchyu Aa Dil Ne Kee Te Prit Kari Kone
Janva Chata Pan Naam Emnu Ame Lai Na Sakya

st: Koini Vaato Na Ame Diwaana Bani Gaya,
s:
Koini Vaato Na Ame Diwaana Bani Gaya,
Koina Prem Na Aansoo Thi Ame Bhinjai Gaya,
Emne Kadar Kya Che Amari?
Ame To Bas Emni Yaado Sathe Ramta Rahi Gaya

st: Kalam Hath Ma Lidhi Tya Ek Aansu Aavyu Aagal
s:
Kalam Hath Ma Lidhi Tya Ek Aansu Aavyu Aagal
Zalzaliya Ni Zaankhap Vachche Lakhie Kya Thi Kaagal
